technology.title: Dan Quinn, Andy Reid both cite fourth downs as a key reason Commanders lost to Chiefs - NBC Sports
technology.description: "There wasn't a lot of punting going on, on either side," Reid said. "Those fourth downs were big."

technology.title: Shohei Ohtani's Second Home Run of Game 3 Sets MLB History Not Seen in Over 100 Years - Sports Illustrated
technology.description: Shohei Ohtani has five home runs and two doubles in his last seven at-bats at Dodger Stadium after his massive performance in Game 3 of the World Series.
